attributes.action: Ask MOPAC for the installation of knife arches in all schools and colleges
attributes.additional_details:
30 teenage homicides in London 2021. 27 stabbings, 2 shootings & 1 suspected arson attack.
40 + teenagers charged with murder during 2021.
Mayor of London said safety of Londoners "will always be my number one priority", before adding he was "investing record amounts in policing to put more officers on the streets". 
Ofsted Report Mar 2019 "Safeguarding children and young people in education from knife crime" needs updating.
attributes.background:
To prioritize effective safeguarding in schools. Schools officers are to educate and protect our young people from the dangers of carrying knives.
Mayor of London said the safety of Londoners will always be my number one priority. Violent Crime increasing - MOPAC needs to give answers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Mayor's Office for Policing And Crime is a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
